name: npm-frontend-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate de Automatización y Optimización de Tareas Front end con Scripts NPM

scripts.global:package: npm i -g node-sass babel-cli babel-preset-latest pug pug-cli browser-sync parallelshell rimraf mkdirp uncss postcss-cli autoprefixer buildify useref useref-cli html-minifier copy imagemin imagemin-cli imagemin-pngquant imagemin-jpeg-recompress imagemin-webp imagemin-svgo imagemin-gifsicle
scripts.dev:package: npm i -D node-sass babel-cli babel-preset-latest pug pug-cli browser-sync parallelshell rimraf mkdirp uncss postcss-cli autoprefixer buildify useref useref-cli html-minifier copy imagemin imagemin-cli imagemin-pngquant imagemin-jpeg-recompress imagemin-webp imagemin-svgo imagemin-gifsicle

author: Jonathan MirCha <jonmircha@gmail.com>
